website_summaries.verdict: The Emerica Emery is a vegan-friendly performance skate shoe that features a one-piece toe cap, die-cut EVA footbed, and a cupsole construction. Known for being supportive and affordable, this low-top furthermore left purchasers satisfied with its materials, performance, and fashion-ready aesthetic. However, the Emery maybe not your best option comfort-wise. Many reported that it fits too snug, which often resulted in discomfort and sometimes heel blisters. Though it's claimed as an excellent pair to skate in, it could still use more ventilation and increased durability for improvement.
pros: Most of the reviewers applauded the stylish look of the Emerica Emery skate shoe
This shoe’s synthetic nubuck material feels nice on foot as claimed by some wearers
Many were delighted that the Emery by Emerica is available at an affordable price
At least a couple of skaters commented that the Emery shoes are good to skate in and have a good flick
Some loyal followers of the brand were pleased that it offers vegan shoes like this one
A few reviewers mentioned that this shoe gives sufficient foot support
cons: Several reviewers were dismayed that the Emerica Emery shoes fit too snug, which results in discomfort
Many users reported that they got blisters on their heel wearing this shoe
There were a couple of reports noting that this shoe is not breathable
At least one wearer commented that this shoe could be a lot better if it were more durable

customer_reviews.title: Squeezes my toes with tapered front portion of shoe. And is 1- 1 1/2 size longer than most shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I usually only wear Vans and Jordan’s. I bought these because they looked nice and was at a good price. This will be my first and last pair of Emerica’s. Worn for one day and already acquiring a blister on my heel. The toe of the shoe is tapered and squeezes my toes. It also fits about 1-1 1/2 size too long. Very flat with no arch whatsoever. I will be sticking with my dependable Van’s from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sharp looking
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe for the price and comfortable to wear so far. Only my first week wearing them. Sizes are a little snug so get 1/2 larger than your usual and you should be all set :)
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing As Always
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as always. I’ve always worn Emerica. shoes and I always plan to. Shoe fits perfect!
customer_reviews.author: The Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Fresh
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I have weird feet but the outside of my ankle bone hits the top of the shoe. Not sure if that makes sense. Never had that happen with any other shoe. Going to have to deal with it or put another insert in because they are great looking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, comfort lacking
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe, however it dug into my Achilles/ankle... really stiff and uncomfortable at the back.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: E-merka for ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I love Emerica and will continue to buy more of their shoes. I've been rockin this brand for over 15 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try before you buy
customer_reviews.text: The shoes kept cutting my ankles on both sides from rubbing
customer_reviews.author: Upset customer

customer_reviews.title: but very comfortable. They look nice
customer_reviews.text: A little snug, but very comfortable. They look nice, and fit my style.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor Lover

customer_reviews.title: GOLD & BLACK ALL DAY
customer_reviews.text: THESE SHOES ARE BITCHIN’! FAVORITIST PAIR OF SHOES SO FAR! (:
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Specific Style is build to wear, not to skate
customer_reviews.text: I used to skate back in the days, this pair I bought them to wear but I will not recommend this specific style of Emerica for skating purpose.
customer_reviews.author: José  Manuel Martínez Gomez

customer_reviews.title: ... a very snug fit and the synthetic nubuck feels nice. unfortunately there's no perforations on this shoe so ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a very snug fit and the synthetic nubuck feels nice. unfortunately there's no perforations on this shoe so my feet tend to overheat in these.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Calleja

customer_reviews.title: Look great, durable The sides by the ankles were a ...
customer_reviews.text: Look great, durable The sides by the ankles were a bit tight so it took my feet some getting used to
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect!! Great price worth every penny! My husband loves these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Steel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really digging these shoes and got them for a great price. Fit as expected and look great.
customer_reviews.author: David Kerkes

customer_reviews.title: Get 1/2 size up
customer_reviews.text: Tight fit from arch to toe. Make sure you get 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.author: josh usalla

customer_reviews.title: Exteremely Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very narrow, long and is made of the stiffest material known to man. The back will give you a blister rubbing up against the back edge of your foot. My foot has been pretty standard size for over 25 years and this shoe really put the squeeze on me.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are in good shape. I like them
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are of good quality and comfortable to wear. The shoes are of good shape and workmanship. The fabric is very comfortable and suitable for home wear
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Ham

product_meta.title: Emerica Men's Emery Skate Shoe
product_meta.description: The Emery is an affordable yet supportive and durable, vegan skate shoe. Offering a one-piece toe cap and die cut eva footbed, all in an Emerica cupsole.
